output_list.reason: The function relies on the internal counter of the blockchain, however, the value of the counter is not always accurate. This can lead to incorrect results when called by an attacker.
The function is only meant to be called by the owner. This creates a vulnerability for anyone to potentially call the function and freeze an account.
The function is vulnerable to integer overflow, as there is no check to ensure the input values are within a safe range.
